item.title: Removing Chart Gridlines & Plot Area Background in Report Studio
item.description: The steps from IBM’s official documentation, while they attempt to lead you in the direction of changing these properties of a chart, did not register with my brain for about an hour or so of clicking around, frustrated that I could not find the properties they were describing in the articl.  Just in case I could spare anyone else the frustration of trying to remove gridlines in Report Studio’s current default charts, I thought I’d post this quick article on how I solved my problem.
